69762538373147389.Text: Native Dunmer regard Imperials as apes posing as civilized beings. The Dunmer respect Imperial cunning in creating organized armies from peasants, and admire their engineering and work ethic, but they scorn their lack of honor and refinement, and they despise their crass commercialism and tolerance of cultural mongrelization.

228235901323725868.Text: Native Dunmer regard Imperials as apes posing as civilized beings. The Dunmer respect Imperial cunning in creating organized armies from peasants, and admire their engineering and work ethic, but they scorn their lack of honor and refinement, and they despise their crass commercialism and tolerance of cultural mongrelization.

1487824477264811581.Text: Imperials are apes posing as civilized beings. we respect Imperial. They can make armies from peasants, and are hard workers and gifted engineers. But Imperials lack of honor and refinement, and we despise their mercantile greed and mongrelized culture.
